    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main
      pre: The program is initialized
      post: calls the method creat videogame and then the menu.

    • createVideoGame

      public static void createVideoGame()
      Creates the Video game
      pre: The program is initialized
      post: Creates the controler class VideoGame and initializes its variables.
      Parameters:
      name - Is the name of the video game.
      resolutionX - is the number of pixels in the x axis of the screen.
      resolutionY - is the number of pixels in the Y axis of the screen.
      videoGame - is the object VideoGame that is created.

    • menu

      public static void menu()
      Menu
      pre: The game must be initialiced
      post: The option that the user chooses will be done.
      Parameters:
      choice - is the number of the option from the menu.

    • registerPlayer

      public static void registerPlayer()
      Registers a new player
      pre: The user chooses the option to register a player in the menu
      post: Creates a new player with the given data.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Is the unique id of the new player.
      name - is the name of the player
      points - The number of points that this player has.
      lives - The number of lives that a player has.
      lvl - The level of a player.
      message - a confirmation or error message displayed after trying to add a new player.

    • registerLevel

      public static void registerLevel()
      Registers the characteristics of a level
      pre: The levels must be created
      post: Changes the default settings of a level to the setting entered.
      Parameters:
      level - Is the number of the level to modify.
      scoreToNextLevel - is the number of points a player must obtain to get to the next level.

    • registerTreasure

      public static void registerTreasure()
      Registers a new treasure to a certain level
      pre: The levels must be created
      post: Adds a new treasure with the characteristics entered.
      Parameters:
      name - Is the name of the treasure.
      imageURL - Is the URL of the image of the treasure.
      pointsIfFound - the number of points that a player gets after finding the treasure.
      level - the level in which the treasure is going to be added.
      msg - is the message displayed after adding the treasure.

    • registerEnemy

      public static void registerEnemy()
      Registers a new enemy to a certain level
      pre: The levels must be created
      post: Adds a new enemy with the characteristics entered.
      Parameters:
      id - Is the identifier of the enemy.
      pointsGiven - Is the number of points a player recieves after defeating the enemy.
      pointsSubtracted - the number of points that a player gets subtracted if the enemy defeats them.
      level - the level in which the enemy is going to be added.
      msg - is the message displayed after adding the Enemy.

    • modifyPoints

      public static void modifyPoints()
      Modifies the points of a certain player
      pre: The player must be allready created
      post: Changes the points of the entered player, to the entered points.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Is the identifier of the player.
      points - Is the number of points the player will recieve.
      msg - Is the message that will be displayed after the process is completed.

    • levelUp

      public static void levelUp()

      pre: The player must be allready created
      post: Changes the level of the entered player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Is the identifier of the player.
      msg - Is the message that will be displayed after the process is completed.
